name: Max's Birthday
description:
You wake up on a boat.

It belongs to Max parents where Max and her many “friends” and enjoyed them self on her birthday. Waking up you see that you forgot to give Max her birthday present so you ask the few people left on the party where she went…

That is what you tell Max parents the morning after party when they realize that their little girl is gone.

Game made by: 

Roxana Rahmlow

Lola Brozio

Christopher Etmer

Max Tromlitz
